weaponMods.name: Advance
weaponMods.description: Physical Damage increased by % [0.6% - 3%]

weaponMods.name: Tactics
weaponMods.description: Increases Skill Effect by [0.6%~3%]

weaponMods.name: Armor Breaker
weaponMods.description: When weapon skills deal direct Physical Damage, has a % change to modify the target's Armor by -% for 6s. Trigger Interval: 30s

weaponMods.name: Fortify
weaponMods.description: When Basic Attacks deal direct damage, has a (melee weapons % / ranged weapons %) chance to gain [Target-based Max HP %] Shield for 4s. Trigger Interval: 30s

weaponMods.name: Dominate
weaponMods.description: When weapon skills or Basic Attacks deal Direct Damage to enemies under Hard Control effects (Stun, Fear, Freeze, Knockup, Petrify), there is a [17%~35%] chance to reduce their Damage Resistance by [-3%~-15%] for 4s. Cooldown: 30s

weaponMods.name: Upperhand
weaponMods.description: When dealing direct damage with Basic Attacks, has a [17%~35%] chance to increase Basic Attack Damage by [7%~35%] for 4s. Trigger Interval: 30s

weaponMods.name: Pursuit
weaponMods.description: When dealing direct damage with Basic Attacks, has a (melee weapons [15%~30%] / ranged weapons [7.5%~15%]) chance to modify the target's Movement Speed by [-7%~-35%] for 4s. Trigger Interval: 10s

weaponMods.name: Ravage
weaponMods.description: When landing a Basic Attack Critical Hit, has a % chance to reduce the target's Damage Resistance by -% for 4s. Cooldown: 30s

weaponMods.name: Magic Break
weaponMods.description: When weapon skills deal direct Magic Damage, has a [8%~40%] chance to modify the target's Magic Resistance by [-4%~-20%] for 6s. Trigger Interval: 30s

weaponMods.name: Charge
weaponMods.description: When weapon skills deal direct damage, has a [10%~50%] chance to restore [10~50] MP. Trigger Interval: 8s

weaponMods.name: Haste
weaponMods.description: When casting weapon skills, has a [20%~40%] chance to increase Cooldown Speed by [5%~25%] for 4s. Trigger Interval: 30s

weaponMods.name: Nimbleness
weaponMods.description: When landing a Basic Attack crit, [8%~40%] chance to increase Dodge by [3%~15%] for 4s. Cooldown: 30s

weaponMods.name: Piercing Chill
weaponMods.description: When inflicting Hard Control effects (Stun, Fear, Freeze, Knockup, Petrify, Sleep) with a Weapon Skill, [9%~45%] chance to lower the enemy's Healing Received by [-4%~-20%] for 4s. Cooldown: 30s

weaponMods.name: Drain
weaponMods.description: When inflicting a DOT with a Weapon Basic Attack or Skill, [8%~40%] chance to recover [2%~10%] HP. Cooldown: 20s

weaponMods.name: Earthquake
weaponMods.description: When a weapon skill inflicts Hard Control effects (Stun, Fear, Frozen, Knockup, Petrify) or Pull effects, it has a [22%~45%] chance to create an earthquake at the target's location. After a 1.5-second delay, it deals [Damage Rate: [16%~80%]] Physical Damage and applies Stun for [0.3~1.5] seconds. Cooldown: 30s

weaponMods.name: Rend
weaponMods.description: When dealing direct damage with Basic Attacks, has a [12%~60%] chance to deal additional [Damage Rate: [20%~100%]] Physical Damage to the current target and reduce Movement Speed by [-10%~-50%] for 2s. Trigger Interval: 20s

weaponMods.name: Retribution
weaponMods.description: When weapon skills deal direct damage, there is a [15%~30%] chance to trigger an explosion at the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: [10%~50%]] Magic Damage and increasing Damage Resistance by [-2%~-10%] for 6s. Trigger Interval: 30s

weaponMods.name: Bloodgrudge
weaponMods.description: When dealing Direct Damage with a Weapon Basic Attack or Skill, [8%~40%] chance to gain 1 stack of a [0.6%~3%] damage boost buff for every 10% of missing HP. Buff lasts 4 seconds, stacks up to 5 times. Cooldown: 30s

weaponMods.name: Shadowstep
weaponMods.description: When using a Weapon Skill, [9%~45%] chance to reduce the CD of weapon-exclusive skills by [0.4%~2%] s. Cooldown: 30s

weaponMods.name: Valor
weaponMods.description: Only triggers with Greatswords. When weapon skills or Basic Attacks deal direct damage, has a [15%~30%] chance to gain 1 stacks of Sword Momentum and increase Damage Resistance by [3%~15%] for 4s. Trigger Interval: 15s. Sword Momentum: Damage Boost: +3% (3% per stack, can stack) Damage Resistance: +4% (4% per stack, can stack) Attack Speed: +4% (4% per stack, can stack)

weaponMods.name: Disrupt
weaponMods.description: *Only triggers with Maces* When skills or Basic Attacks deal Direct Damage, has a % chance to create a disruption field around the caster. Enemies within take -% reduced damage and have their Attack Speed reduced by % for 4s. Cooldown: 20s

weaponMods.name: Seize Chance
weaponMods.description: *Only triggers with Axes* When gaining [Bloodthirst] buff, has a % chance to increase Attack Speed by % and Damage by % for 6s. Trigger Interval: 20s

weaponMods.name: Detonate
weaponMods.description: Only triggers with Bows. When arrows deal direct damage, has a [15%~30%] chance of creating an explosion at the target location dealing [Damage Rate: [20%~100%]] Physical Damage and applying [Target Mark]. Also stun for 1.5 seconds. Trigger Interval: 20s

weaponMods.name: Synergy
weaponMods.description: Only triggers with Spears when scoring a Critical Hit, has a [17%~35%] chance to increase Attack Speed by [6%~30%] for 6s. Cooldown: 20s

weaponMods.name: Annihilate
weaponMods.description: Only triggers with Daggers. Against targets below 40%, Basic Attacks have a [15%~30%] chance to deal additional [Damage Rate: [20%~100%]] Physical Damage and apply 2 stacks of [Bleed]. Trigger Interval: 15s. [Bleed]: Deals [Damage Rate: 30%] Physical Damage every second for 8s, stacking up to 6 times. At max stacks, causes Hemorrhage, removing all stacks and instantly dealing [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage.

weaponMods.name: Wild Growth
weaponMods.description: Only triggers with Bloom Staves. When weapon skills or Basic Attacks directly heal an ally with Recovery, has a [7.5%~15%] * Recovery stacks chance to grant [Target-based Max HP [3%~15%]] Shield for 4s. Trigger Interval: 15s. Recovery: Restores [Healing Rate: 12%] HP every second for 12s, stacking up to 3 times. Trigger Interval: 20s

weaponMods.name: Ice Blast
weaponMods.description: Only triggers with Ice Foci. When weapon skills or Basic Attacks deal direct damage, has a [15%~30%] chance to trigger a frost explosion at the target location that deals [Damage Rate: [12%~60%]] Magic Damage to all enemies within 4m and inflicts Frost. Trigger Interval: 20s. Frost: Movement Speed is reduced by -40% for 4s, Slow gradually diminishes over time

weaponMods.name: Flame Blast
weaponMods.description: Only triggers with Cannonades. When weapon skills or Basic Attacks deal direct damage, has a [12%~30%] chance to trigger a flame explosion at the target location that deals [Damage Rate: [26%~130%]] Magic Damage to all enemies within 4m and inflicts 2 stacks of Burn. Trigger Interval: 15s. Burn: Deals [Damage Rate: 25%] Magic Damage every second for 8s, stacking up to 6 times. At 6 stacks, removes the effect and deals [Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage to enemy targets within 4m of the carrier.

weaponMods.name: Blessing
weaponMods.description: Only triggers with Radiant Fluxes. When weapon skills or Basic Attacks apply direct healing to allies, has a [15%~30%] chance to increase target's Damage Resistance by [5%~25%] for 5s. Trigger Interval: 15s

weaponMods.name: Curse
weaponMods.description: Only triggers with Voidcallers. When weapon skills or Basic Attacks inflict DoT effects on enemies, has a [12%~60%] chance to inflict 2 stacks of Plague. Trigger Interval: [30~12]s. Plague: Deals [Damage Rate: 20%] Magic Damage every 3s for 13s. Stacks up to 10 times.

weaponMods.name: Retrofit
weaponMods.description: When Weapon Skills or Basic Attacks deal direct damage, has a [15%~30%] chance to restore 2 bullet and boosts Basic Attack Damage by [7%~35%] for 6s. Trigger Interval: 15s
